function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliability bias in self-reporting questionnaires due to under-reporting, under-estimating, and misunderstanding of mental health issues","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of mental health status and potential impact on university students' well-being","Mitigation":"Implement independent and validated psychiatric assessments alongside self-reporting questionnaires","Technologies":"Validated evidence-based psychiatric assessment tools","People":"University students","Owner":"University health services"},{"Description":"Limitations of cross-sectional study design in determining temporal relationships between variables","Impact":"Inability to establish cause-and-effect relationships between housing characteristics and mental health status","Mitigation":"Conduct longitudinal studies to observe changes in mental health status over time in relation to housing characteristics","Technologies":"Longitudinal study design","People":"Research and academic institutions","Owner":"Research teams and funding organizations"},{"Description":"Limited generalizability of results due to low response rate and recruitment from a single university","Impact":"Inability to apply findings to a broader population of university students","Mitigation":"Diversify recruitment efforts across multiple universities and increase response rates through incentives or outreach programs","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, targeted advertising, and outreach campaigns","People":"Researchers, survey administrators","Owner":"Research teams and funding organizations"}]}
